CustomField.description: Use this field to summarise changes you've made to the narrative folllowing the partner review. Any changes should be made within the narrative itself (i.e. you should overwrite where applicable). You can also outline here why you've not made a change suggested in the partner review plus your reasoning.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Use this field to summarise changes you've made to the narrative folllowing the partner review. Any changes should be made within the narrative itself (i.e. you should overwrite where applicable). You can also outline here why you've not made a change suggested in the partner review plus your reasoning.
CustomField.label: Explain changes to the initial narrative
